flag.name: convert
flag.short: convert source files (tex, mkii, mkiv, mp, etc.) to 'ted' files

flag.name: process
flag.short: process source files (tex, mkii, mkiv, mp, etc.) to 'pdf' files

flag.name: prep
flag.short: use original name with suffix 'prep' appended

flag.name: direct
flag.short: use old method instead of extra
